reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized unique architectural features (stairs, bay windows, kitchen layouts) and specific lighting/fixture details (recessed lights, adjacent bathrooms) before resolving ambiguities in the highly similar bedroom images. Desc_7 (Stairwell), Desc_2 (Utility Balcony), Desc_3 (Kitchen+Bath), and Desc_5 (Kitchen+Balcony Exit) were matched with high confidence based on unique visual elements. Desc_4 was matched to Image_4 due to the explicit mention of '天花嵌燈' (recessed lighting), leaving Image_1 for Desc_1 (Living Room with TV cabinet). The five remaining bedrooms (Desc_6, Desc_8, Desc_12 with balconies; Desc_10, Desc_11 without) were matched sequentially to the visually similar Image_6, Image_8, Image_12, Image_10, and Image_11, respectively. Although Image_11 does not visually appear '略狹長' (slightly narrow/long), it was assigned to Desc_11 by mutual exclusion, as Image_10 better fits the '方正' (square) tag for Desc_10.

matching_result_list.evidence: Living room view featuring a bay window structure and a built-in wooden cabinet/TV stand on the right side, matching the '已設電視櫃' tag.
Semi-enclosed, low-light area with rough brick texture and a recessed storage nook, consistent with '半戶外空間/工作陽台' and '空間可作儲物'.
Modern kitchen with white cabinets, double sink, and a clear doorway leading directly into a bathroom (toilet visible), fulfilling '廚房+衛浴區' and '衛浴與廚房相鄰'.
Spacious room with uniform overhead lighting provided by recessed ceiling lights (嵌燈), matching '天花嵌燈照明均勻'.
Modern kitchen setup with ample storage and a glass door on the left providing '後陽台出入' (rear balcony access).
Square bedroom layout with a large sliding glass door providing balcony access and good natural light.
Clear view of a stairwell with wooden railings and a window protected by security bars (鐵窗), matching '樓梯間' and '樓梯有扶手'.
Square bedroom layout with a large sliding glass door providing balcony access, suitable for a master bedroom ('可做主臥使用').
Compact bathroom with basic facilities (toilet, sink, shower head) and no physical partition, confirming '乾濕未明顯分離'.
Square bedroom with a small window, fitting the '房型方正' and '採光普通' tags for a secondary room.
Small bedroom with a window, assigned by exclusion to the '房型略狹長' description, despite appearing visually square.
Square bedroom layout with a large sliding glass door, representing the third balcony bedroom option ('臥室E').
